p: The collected samples were identified as Laurus nobilis L. by Dr. Ivanka Dimitrova at the University of Plovdiv “Paisii Hilendarski” in Plovdiv, Bulgaria. The moisture (39.7 ± 0.35% for leaves from Greece and 29.5 ± 0.35% for leaves from Georgia) was determined after drying at 105 oС to constant weight ( The State Pharmacopoeia of the USSR, 1990). The samples were analyzed for polyphenols and EO content and the values were presented on an absolute dry weight basis.
